data: A week of fun winter-related activities!

Join us from 6pm to 8pm for Drama Councils annual Light Up The Hill! There will be games, prizes, food, live performances, and more. To enter, bring food or money to donate to our super duper awesome breakfast program.

Small ensembles will be perfoming in the front foyer on select mornings!
  • Tuesday: Saxophone Ensemble ðŸŽ·
  • Thursday: Flute Ensemble ðŸªˆ
  • Friday: Clarinet Ensemble (im so sorry there's no clarinet emoji ðŸ¥º)
Find StuCo in the front foyer period 2-4 to write a holiday card for charity!
Clubs will be selling cool things in the front foyer during period 2-4! Be there or be square (ðŸŸ¥)!
Build the bestest and coolest gingerbread houses and win prizes! This event is also part of grade wars so you can earn points for your grade as well!
Find us in the front foyer periods 2 to 4 for free hot chocolate!
Vote for your 2025-2026 RHHS Student Council!
Grade 12s will have their period 4 and 5 exams on the 16th and 17th, respectively. Check your GAPPS email for more info.

All grades will have their period 1, 2, and 3 exams on the 18th, 19th, and 20th respectively. Grades 9-11 will have their period 4 and 5 exams on the 23rd and 24th respectively. Check your GAPPS email for more info.
Grades 9-11 will have their period 4 and 5 exams on the 23rd and 24th respectively. Check your GAPPS email for more info.
Look over your exam and discuss final marks. Check your GAPPS email for more info.
An orientation day for students new to the school or in community classes. Welcome Grade 9s! ðŸ˜Š
Time to kick off the first full day of classes! Students follow their regular schedule, meet teachers, and settle into the routine for the school year ahead.

Apply, submit your videos, and cast your vote for grade reps and mascots.
Check out the election package here.
Get ready to show your school spirit! This weekâ€™s themes are RHHS Day, Performative Day, Silly Hat Day, and Throwback Thursday.
Explore interests, meet members, and sign up for activities for the year!
Watch a movie with your friends under the stars, enjoy delicious snacks, and celebrate the spirit of RHHS.
